title: WATCH: Antoine Griezmann argues with Atletico Madrid fans in Valencia win
description: Antoine Griezmann was involved in a spat with his own fans as Atletico Madrid beat Valencia 1-0 at home on Sunday.
content:
Griezmann, who has been linked with a move away from Atletico, frustrated supporters at the Wanda Metropolitano when he slowed play down late in the game rather than look for a second goal.
While the fans made their feelings clear to Griezmann by whistling and jeering, they probably didn't expect him to respond by turning back and then putting his finger to his lips to tell them to be quiet.
Atletico won the game thanks to a brilliant long-range strike from Angel Correa in the second half.
Hit play on the video at the top of the page to watch the incident involving Griezmann
